p: Table 3 shows the performance of the prediction models for seasonal influenza outbreaks in the U.S. after 26 weeks using previous season data, LR, ARIMAX, and ANN. The R 2 scores of LR, ARIMAX, and ANN for ILI, Total INF, INF A, and INF B showed better performance than those of the previous season. The R 2 score for the prediction model of ANN for ILI was 0.758. The R 2 score of ARIMAX for Total INF was 0.806, which was the highest.
